description: The OR_LNLG_COUNTS_INTERPRETD table contains information about whether the surgeon and radiologist communicated about their interpretations of the radiographs.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COUNT_INTERPRET_RAD_IMAGES_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value for whether the radiologist and surgeon communicated about the images.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
